packageRules.description: Disable JAXB updates, because 3.x and 4.x causes reflective errors. e.g. 4.x on Java 17: 'Unable to make protected final java.lang.Class java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(java.lang.String,byte[],int,int) throws java.lang.ClassFormatError accessible' at com.sun.xml.bind.v2.runtime.reflect.opt.Injector.
Disable updating Bootstrap, as major versions contain breaking changes which would fully break the UI.
